content: अव्यग्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not agitated or ruffled, steady, cool. {@--2@} Not engaged or occupied (in business); अव्यग्रस्य पुनरस्य <ls>U. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Indifferent, undisturbed. {@--4@} Attentive, careful. --ग्रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Quietly, at ease, coolly, leisurely; क्रव्यमव्यग्रमत्ति <ls>Māl. 5. 16.</ls>
